Hands-On Time

Scaling Pods With ReplicaSets

Creating ReplicaSets

cat rs/go-demo-2.yml

kubectl create -f rs/go-demo-2.yml

kubectl get rs

kubectl describe -f rs/go-demo-2.yml

kubectl get pods

Operating ReplicaSets

POD_NAME=$(kubectl get pods -o name | tail -1)

kubectl delete $POD_NAME

kubectl get pods

ReplicaSets?

  • Guarantee that replicas of a Pod are running
  • Rarely created independently but through Deployments

What Now?

kubectl delete -f rs/go-demo-2.yml
